channel.title: How to create a custom pk zone ( mod reward )
channel.description:
Hi, im looking for a custom pk zone for my server, whoever can solve this will be given moderator on a server with over 50 players, my source is a delta base, if any of use can solve this please can we do it over team veiwer, thanks, add my skype,
called : jake.wrightson from UK
